title: The Bible Kneecap Free Preview
itunes:title: The Bible Kneecap Free Preview
description:
Father, 

 

We praise You for the way You care for Your kids even when they’ve wandered off. You identify so closely with us that anytime we’re mistreated, You take it personally. Thank You for working justice on those who have opposed and oppressed Your people. 

 

Have mercy on me, a sinner. We repent of our sins and turn to You and we ask You to make our hearts clean. Like Edom, we have been passive—standing by idly while people acted unjustly. We’ve been arrogant and selfish, and we repent. 

 

Would You inspire us to action? Show us what it looks like to care for the oppressed, to not use someone’s weakness against them, and to pursue righteousness even when it comes to those we consider to be our enemies. Use us to do Your will today.

 

We surrender our lives to You, Lord—every moment of our day, each decision we make, we yield our will and way to Your perfect will and way. 

 

We love You too. Amen.

 

SHOW NOTES:

Host & Writer: Tara-Leigh Cobble

Sound Engineer: Allison Congden

Patreon / Show Notes / Transcripts: Olivia Ramsey & Laura Buchelt

Logo: Landon Wade

Patreon: patreon.com/thebiblerecap

Website: thebiblerecap.com

The Bible Kneecap is brought to you by D-Group, an international network of discipleship and accountability groups that meet weekly in homes and churches: Find or start one near you today!
